text: Kathari is a village in Barmer District in Rajasthan, India. Kathari is 116.3 km from Barmer, the main city of its district, and 364 km from Jaipur, the main city of its state. Historically Kathari village of Malani Kingdom was ruled by Independent Mahecha Clan of Rathore Rajputs. ==External links== * Everywhere magazine article about Barmer * Kathari article Category:Villages in Barmer district
title: Kathari
